EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: IPro Media ~ Service
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Timba Surveys] IPro Media ~ Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Please rate the service your received: IPro Media ~ Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We hope that your recent service request was handled to your satisfaction. We look for forward to meeting your business communications needs for many years to come. In order to assist us in improving our customer satisfaction, Please complete this short survey located at: %SURVEY_URL%
Thank you very much.
Sincerely,
Richard Bell President IPro Media, Inc
Case Information Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
_____________________________________________________________________ Surveys Made Easy by Timba Surveys http://sfproducts.altimetrik.com/forums
